Affliction.name: Insanity
Affliction.description: The subject is losing their grip on reality due to exposure to supernatural forces.

AfflictionPsychosis.name: Psychosis
AfflictionPsychosis.description: The patient rants and mutters in an agitated fashion, a steady commentary of unseen events.

Affliction.name: Let us meet again as stars
Affliction.description: As you descend into psychosis, you can't help but sense the Blue Star's ambiance in the back of your mind.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: Let us meet again as stars.

Affliction.name: Fragile
Affliction.description: The body is more susceptible to damage.

Affliction.name: Paralyze
Affliction.description: The body is physically weakened, reducing the ability to fight.

Affliction.name: PALE
Affliction.description: The patient's very essence is being destroyed.

Affliction.name: Exuviae Infection
Affliction.description: A parasitic infection has taken root in your body. Antibiotics should flush it out.
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: Taken over by the Exuviae Infection.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were killed by the Exuviae Infection.

Affliction.name: Exuvie Precursor
Affliction.description: An affliction for handling the infection.

Affliction.name: Rupture
Affliction.description: The body has been ruptured by an unusual energy source. Wounds appear to have been cut cleanly and then forced open, causing massive trauma and increasing how quickly blood loss occurs.

Affliction.name: CENSORED Corrosion
Affliction.description: E.G.O. Resonance can offer great power, but one should be wary not to lose themselves to the Abnormality's influence.

Affliction.name: Magic Bullet Corrosion
Affliction.description: E.G.O. Resonance can offer great power, but one should be wary not to lose themselves to the Abnormality's influence.

Affliction.name: Fell Bullet Corrosion
Affliction.description: E.G.O. Resonance can offer great power, but one should be wary not to lose themselves to the Abnormality's influence.

Affliction.name: Gaze
Affliction.description: Deal more damage based on this effect's value, but if it reaches its maximum, suffer massive bleed damage.

Affliction.name: All-Beholding Gaze
Affliction.description: Take damage over time equivalent to this effect's level.

Affliction.name: Grasp
Affliction.description: You need to break out before you get crushed!

Affliction.name: Gossypium
Affliction.description: The patient is flowering. Stun damage is converted to bleeding.

Affliction.name: Blood Deluge
Affliction.description: A considerable portion of blood is being sucked out of the body, but the process is also reducing the existing rate of blood loss - trading bleeding for blood loss.

Affliction.name: E.G.O. Destabilized
Affliction.description: The E.G.O. has become destabilized, risking deterioration into something terrible.

Affliction.name: E.G.O. Strengthened
Affliction.description: The E.G.O. has become strengthened, making the impossible possible.

Affliction.name: Mimicry Corrosion
Affliction.description: E.G.O. Resonance can offer great power, but one should be wary not to lose themselves to the Abnormality's influence.

Affliction.name: Blubbering Toad Corrosion
Affliction.description: E.G.O. Resonance can offer great power, but one should be wary not to lose themselves to the Abnormality's influence.

Affliction.name: Indelible Stigma
Affliction.description: An indelible stigma has been left on your heart.

Affliction.name: Physical Intervention Shield
Affliction.description: A shield is protecting the subject against physical damage.

Affliction.name: Trauma Shield
Affliction.description: A shield is protecting the subject against psychological damage.

Affliction.name: Infection Shield
Affliction.description: A shield is protecting the subject against infections.

Affliction.name: PALE Shield
Affliction.description: A shield is protecting the subject against Abnormality-specific damage.

Affliction.name: Degraded Fairy
Affliction.description: It's 'unlocking' every pore of your body.

Affliction.name: Fairy
Affliction.description: It's 'unlocking' every pore of your body.

Affliction.name: Shockwave
Affliction.description: A powerful shockwave has struck your body.

Affliction.name: Nails
Affliction.description: Metal nails are protruding from the victim's flesh.

Affliction.name: Nail Drive: Paralyzing
Affliction.description: Drives nails into the body and inflicts Paralyze.

Affliction.name: Tremor
Affliction.description: The body is resonating with a strange energy.

Affliction.name: Staggered
Affliction.description: Whether from a hefty strike or a Tremor Burst, the patient has been disoriented.

Affliction.name: Tremor: Scorch
Affliction.description: The body is resonating with a strange, fiery energy.

Affliction.name: Tremor: Reverb
Affliction.description: The body is resonating with a strange, impactful energy.

Affliction.name: Tremor: Hemorrhage
Affliction.description: The body is resonating with a strange, sanguine energy.

Affliction.name: Tremor: Chain
Affliction.description: The body is resonating with a strange, burdensome energy.

Affliction.name: Tremor: Decay
Affliction.description: The body is resonating with a strange, deteriorating energy.

Affliction.name: Lost Time
Affliction.description: A time deficit causes you to move slower. From the perspective of the sufferer, they move at a normal rate while everything else moves faster.

Affliction.name: Accelerated Time
Affliction.description: A time surplus causes you to move faster. From the perspective of the beneficiary, they move at a normal rate while everything else moves slower.

Affliction.name: Borrowed Time
Affliction.description: A time surplus causes you to move faster. From the perspective of the beneficiary, they move at a normal rate while everything else moves slower.

Affliction.name: Time Moratorium
Affliction.description: It looks like you're not taking any damage, but that doesn't seem right...

Affliction.name: Execution
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were executed by a member of the Thumb.

Affliction.name: WARNING
Affliction.description: WARNING! DO NOT TOUCH THE BUTTON!

Affliction.name: Teleportation Sickness
Affliction.description: You're feeling uneasy and your stomach is turning. Teleporting again may cause unwanted side-effects!

Affliction.name: Serum R
Affliction.description: Greatly improves the subject's strength and speed for a short duration. Its effect is strongest immediately after injection.

Affliction.name: Serum K
Affliction.description: Fortifies the subject and regenerates any damage they may have taken.

Affliction.name: The Living Butterfly
Affliction.description: A solemn lamentation for the life-bound.

Affliction.name: The Departed Butterfly
Affliction.description: A congratulation for the departed dead.

Affliction.name: Onrush
Affliction.description: In the wake of death, you feel a rush of exhiliration.

Affliction.name: Coffin
Affliction.description: Lasts 15 seconds. Grants up to 50% more melee attack power and speed.

Affliction.name: O Dullahan!
Affliction.description: It's time to ride for death!

Affliction.name: Impending Ruin
Affliction.description: Lose Offense Level based on how much Psychosis you have.

Affliction.name: Ally Mark
Affliction.description: You're spared from the wrath of the Wild Hunt.

Affliction.name: Portal Bullet Targeting Precursor: Tier 1
Affliction.description: Determines if the target is valid.

dragdown.name: Dragdown
dragdown.description: The Individuals soon to be dragged to the ground and ripped apart. Stun resistance may help delay this fate.

Affliction.name: Arrested Hymn (Effect)
Affliction.description: Move slower, but gain increased max health.

Affliction.name: Blood Red Mane: Defensive
Affliction.description: You will take 25% less damage when you are hit next.

Affliction.name: Opiate Medicine Cooldown
Affliction.description: You aren't allowed to inject more medicine of this type at the moment.

Affliction.name: Torn Memory
Affliction.description: You don't want to remember them. Not right now. Or your wrath might harm them too.

Affliction.name: Torn Memory
Affliction.description: You don't want to remember them. Not right now. Or your wrath might harm them too.

Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: Overdosed on K Corp Healing Ampules.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You overdosed on K Corp Healing Ampules.

Affliction.name: Bloodfeast Compatible
Affliction.description: Able to benefit from the effects of Bloodfeast.

Affliction.name: Tianjiu Star Blade
Affliction.description: An ominous power stirs within the blade.

Affliction.name: Tianjiu Star Blade Unsheathed
Affliction.description: An ominous power stirs within the blade.

Affliction.name: Intravascular Venom
Affliction.description: Snake venom flows through the subject's veins, weakening them. Stabilozine should do the trick.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were killed by a serpent's poison.

Affliction.name: Curse: Atrophy
Affliction.description: You are no longer able to run.

Affliction.name: Gaze of Contempt
Affliction.description: The power of the Spiral of Contempt strengthens you.

Affliction.name: Gaze
Affliction.description: Why don't you just die standing up? The freshness of your hideous gaze is decaying by the second.

Affliction.name: Passive Regeneration
Affliction.description: In the absence of damage, heal your wounds.

Affliction.name: Reduced Healing Effectiveness
Affliction.description: Medicines are less effective on the patient.

Affliction.name: Savage Tigerslayer
Affliction.description: All I want is to bare my fangs.

Affliction.name: Canned Knowledge
Affliction.description: Indoctrination? We prefer to call it enlightenment.

Affliction.name: Return Fire
Affliction.description: Deal more ranged damage and move faster.

Affliction.name: Salvation Cooldown
Affliction.description: You aren't allowed to avoid death again at the moment.

Affliction.name: Wild Hunt Cooldown
Affliction.description: You aren't allowed to summon the wild hunt again at the moment.

Affliction.name: Red Plum Blossom
Affliction.description: An experienced swordsman's mark has been left on the body.

Affliction.name: Unrelenting
Affliction.description: For the next 15 seconds, Bamboo-Hatted Kim is effectively immortal.

Affliction.name: Swordplay of the Homeland
Affliction.description: Your mentor's guidance hones your form.

Affliction.name: Blade Dance
Affliction.description: Take pride in the scars you've gained.

Affliction.name: Slash Fragility
Affliction.description: The body is more susceptible to slashing damage.

Affliction.name: Please be traceless in your deeds.
Jin Gang Bolus Cooldown
Affliction.description: You aren't allowed to avoid death again at the moment.

Affliction.name: Smoke
Affliction.description: The patient is breathing chemical smoke, causing them to cough violently.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You succumbed to gas-induced respiratory failure.

Affliction.name: Parry
Affliction.description: An effective parry can redirect damage away from yourself, but it requires incredible skill to pull off.

Affliction.name: Zwei Parry
Affliction.description: An effective parry can redirect damage away from yourself, but it requires incredible skill to pull off.

Affliction.name: Stigmatized Parry
Affliction.description: An effective parry can redirect damage away from yourself, but it requires incredible skill to pull off.

Affliction.name: Perfect Parry
Affliction.description: An effective parry can redirect damage away from yourself, but it requires incredible skill to pull off.

Affliction.name: Parry Cooldown
Affliction.description: Cannot parry again at the moment.

Affliction.name: Courier Trunk
Affliction.description: Devyat Courier Trunks emanate energy that can empower the wielder, but an excess of this power can be dangerous.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You died from excessive decay particle exposure.
